description: This Java class ResumeParserService extracts text from resume files, identifies known skills, and extracts keywords for indexing or analysis. It interacts with a ResumeRepository to save parsed resume data.

classes.name: ResumeParserService
classes.description: Service class responsible for parsing resumes and extracting text, skills, and keywords, then saving the resume data.

methods.name: parseAndPersist
methods.description: Main method that extracts text from a resume file, identifies skills and keywords, and persists the Resume object.

methods.name: extractText
methods.description: Uses Apache Tika to extract text content from the resume file.

methods.name: extractSkills
methods.description: Checks the text for the presence of known skills and returns a list of found skills.

methods.name: extractKeywords
methods.description: Processes the text to extract the top 30 keywords based on frequency, filtering out short tokens and numbers.
